parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource ID. You can specify up to 20 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **ANYCASTEIPADDRESS**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description:
The key of the tag that you want to remove. You can specify at most 20 tag keys. The tag key cannot be an empty string.

A tag key can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot start with aliyun or acs:, and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`.
